tests.name: Pipeline echoes through cat
tests.description: Single pipeline stage forwards data between commands.

tests.name: Conditionals syntax placeholder
tests.description: if/then/else syntax is parsed (branches execute sequentially until flow control lands).

tests.name: Builtins update environment and status
tests.description: export/unset update environment and shell status variables.

tests.name: Shell functions execute stored bodies
tests.description: function keyword and name() syntax register and invoke shell functions.
tests.expected_stdout:
functions:start
hello from greet
goodbye from farewell
functions:end

tests.name: setenv/unsetenv mirror POSIX behaviour
tests.description: setenv updates variables, prints the environment, and unsetenv removes entries.

tests.name: Pipeline cache reuse emits notice
tests.description: Second run loads cached bytecode for the same script.

tests.name: Case statements dispatch patterns
tests.description: case selects the first matching clause and defaults otherwise.
tests.expected_stdout:
case:start
match foo
match group
match default qux
case:end

tests.name: Command substitution captures stdout
tests.description: $(...) trims trailing newlines and supports line continuations.
tests.expected_stdout:
command-substitution:start
value:foo
inline:xABy
quoted:line1
line2
command-substitution:end

tests.name: Legacy backtick substitution is supported
tests.description: Backtick command substitution trims trailing newlines and honors escapes.
